spec.name: Demolitionist
spec.subtitle: Force of Destruction
spec.description: Demolitionists can be much more technically-minded than most Hired Guns. They are also suited to much more than straightforward combat. They can excel at setting traps, from improvised trip-wires tied to grenades to sophisticated proximity and timed explosives. Whereas another Hired Gun might go after an enemy in a straight-up fight, a Demolitionist may find a more inventive route, such as rigging a thermal detonator to explode when the target starts up his speeder. Some Demolitionists enjoy the thrill of combat as much as any other Hired Gun, however they favor flame projectors, grenade launchers, and missile tubes - anything that creates a large blast.
